channel.title: www.THE REGULAR JOES.com
channel.description:
Tired of the Stuffy Suits of Sports and want to hear from a regular joe's point of view?
This is what you were looking for! The Regular Joes pulls no stops.... and that's the way WE like it!
Listen to the show HERE!
Watch the show on http://www.yeahsports.net! It's even funnier watching it!
If you have any Comments or Questions for THE REGULAR JOES
joes@theregularjoes.com
www.TheRegularJoes.com
http://www.Myspace.com/yeahsports
Call 1-626-722-0023

item.title: The Regular Joes - Year End Holiday Special
